messages.content: Can you help me write a javascript code that will take a photo and break it into RGB by pixels and display three different photos one composing only the res elements one blue elements one green elements and have them display one after the other when you click them

Can you write a new script that takes a photo and makes it grayscale only? And then present four of the same image one upper left one upper right one lower left one lower right

The one on the upper right should be the grayscale image presented using only red from rgb leds 
The lower left green and bottom left blue
